title: GAME KEEPS CRASHING
body:
**my game keeps crashing and attempting to reconnect, please if you can look at it?,**

**if anyone else has had this problem please share** 
**thank you,**

replies.body:
What kind of crash is it, exactly? Are you experiencing disconnection problems, or is the client actually crashing on your computer?

What OS are you using, and who's your ISP?
